title: Field
description: A field defines a form field that will be shown to the user when creating or editing a map entity. Presets define which fields are shown to the user for a particular map entity. The field definition defines whether the field should show as a text box, multiple choice, single-select, etc. It defines what tag-value is set when the field is entered.

tagKey.description: They key in a tags object that this field applies to

type.description: Type of field - defines how the field is displayed to the user.

meta:enum.selectOne: Select one item from a list of pre-defined options
meta:enum.selectMultiple: Select any number of items from a list of pre-defined options

label.description: Default language label for the form field label

appearance.description: For text fields, display as a single-line or multi-line field

meta:enum.singleline: Text will be cut-off if more than one line
meta:enum.multiline: Text will wrap to multiple lines within text field

snakeCase.description: Convert field value into snake_case (replace spaces with underscores and convert to lowercase)

options.description: List of options the user can select for single- or multi-select fields

universal.description: If true, this field will appear in the Add Field list for all presets

placeholder.description: Displayed as a placeholder in an empty text or number field before the user begins typing. Use 'helperText' for important information, because the placeholder is not visible after the user has entered data.

helperText.description: Additional context about the field, e.g. hints about how to answer the question.
